notes: This is a template manifest. Run validate_sunrgbd to generate actual manifest.
The dataset contains 4 different sensor types with varying resolutions.
RGB and depth resolutions may differ, especially for Kinect v2.
Intrinsics are provided per image in intrinsics.txt files.
Extrinsics align the point cloud with gravity.
Scene information is provided in scene.txt files.
usage: This file is used by the data loader to identify valid images and their properties.
